input.name: [concat(parameters('vmName'), '-', parameters('AdditionalDiskSuffix'), string(CopyIndex('dataDisks', 1)))]
input.diskSizeGB: [if(less(copyIndex('dataDisks'), parameters('#ofDataDisks')), parameters('DataDisksSize'), if(less(copyIndex('dataDisks'), add(parameters('#ofDataDisks'), parameters('#ofLogDisks'))), parameters('LogDisksSize'), parameters('additionalDisksSize')))]
input.caching: [if(less(copyIndex('dataDisks'), parameters('#ofDataDisks')), variables('DataDiskCacheSetting'), if(less(copyIndex('dataDisks'), add(parameters('#ofDataDisks'), parameters('#ofLogDisks'))), variables('LogDiskCacheSetting'), variables('AdditionalDiskCacheSetting')))]

managedDisk.storageAccountType: [if(less(copyIndex('dataDisks'), parameters('#ofDataDisks')), parameters('dataDiskstorageSku'), if(less(copyIndex('dataDisks'), add(parameters('#ofDataDisks'), parameters('#ofLogDisks'))), parameters('logDiskstorageSku'), variables('AdditionalDiskStorageSku')))]

variables.SqlIaasOptimizeCseParameters: [concat('-NumberOfDataDisks ', parameters('#ofDataDisks'), if(equals(tolower(parameters('stripeDataDisks')), 'yes'), ' -StripeDataDisks', ''), ' -NumberOfLogDisks ', parameters('#ofLogDisks'), if(equals(tolower(parameters('stripeLogDisks')), 'yes'), ' -StripeLogDisks', ''), ' -NumberOfAdditionalDisks ', parameters('#ofAdditionalDisks'), ' -WorkloadType "', parameters('workloadType'), '" -SysAdminUsername "', parameters('adminUsername') , '" -SysAdminPassword "', parameters('adminPassword'), '"')]
